document.full_text: france called thursday for the u.n. force in ivory coast to do more to stop violence, adding to growing pressure on the world body to take bolder action to halt the country's slide into all-out civil war.
document.title: u.n. should do more to stop ivory coast violence: france
lines_and_colors: france called thursday for the u.n. force in ivory coast to do more to stop violence, adding to growing pressure on the world body to take bolder action to halt the country's slide into all-out civil war.
